title: Tasker 5.15 brings an Android 13 dynamic app icon, custom toasts, clipboard additions, and more
content:
Tasker is one of the most powerful power-user tools on Android, allowing you to create everything from simple on-device automated tasks to more intricate systems. Thereâ€™s almost no limit to what you can do with the app (especially when it’s granted root access), and now an update is rolling out on the Google Play Store

The post Tasker 5.15 brings an Android 13 dynamic app icon, custom toasts, clipboard additions, and more appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Tasker 5.15 is here, and it brings an Android 13 dynamic app icon, custom toasts, clipboard additions, and more. Check out the changelog!
